document_data.name: Lyre
document_data.mainbody: A '''lyre''' was an ancient and portable stringed musical instrument.
document_data.Usage: Lyres provided good accompaniment and background music for poems and epic recitals through the ages.
document_data.Availability:
* The lyre was particularly associated with [[Amn]]. Such lyres were sold in [[Halambar Lutes & Harps]] in [[Waterdeep]], a well-known musical instrument shop.
* ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold lyres under the "Bards' Emporium" section of their catalogue for around 40 gold pieces.
document_data.Notable Lyres:
[[File:Spider's Lyre.png|thumb|''A simple lyre from the Sword Coast.'']]
* ''[[Cli lyre]]'', oe of the seven ''[[Instrument of the Bards|Instruments of the Bards]]''. Magical lyres that held protective spells, as well as other magical powers.
* ''[[Dragonbone lyre]]'', a lyre carved of [[dragon]] bone. A certain haunting tune played on this could subdue the [[undead]] [[Whispermere guardian|guardian]] of the [[Shadow Swamp]].
* ''[[Lyre of building]]''
* ''[[Lyre of progression]]''
* ''[[Spider's lyre]]'', a variety of enchanted lyre used by the [[Cult of the Absolute]].
document_data.Notable Users:
* [[Apollo]], a member of the [[Olympian pantheon]], had the instrument as his holy symbol and owned a unique magical lyre that was fashioned for him by his fellow Olympian [[Hermes]].<ref>
* [[Bonnie Harper]], a member of the [[bard]]ic group [[Adagio Jones and The Goodwinds]], had a lyre that she played for soft songs.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/54/The New Rogues Gallery: Adagio Jones and The Goodwinds|7}}
